summary:
A little patch to make Requiem and HAR compatibles.

Un petit patch rendant Requiem et HAR compatibles
descriptionHtml:
Hello.

HAR is a good mod to improve the immersion of Skyrim. But if you play with requiem, it will have a conflict :

- Size of HAR will be not used or many changed of Requiem will be not used.

So I do a little patch to correct the problem.

This patch required :

- Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul
- Heigh Adjusted race with true Giant. (I will do for the other HAR mod)

Load order :

...
HAR
Requiem
Other requiem patch
Requiem - HAR patch


Installation :

Just put the esp in Skyrim data file.
author: Epicaha

files.name: Requiem - HAR patch with true giant
files.fileName: Requiem - HAR patch with true giant-53050-1-0.rar
